Reviews.Title: “A Great Safety Net.”

Reviews.Content: stayed recently extended period due hotels available found originally late booking site extended stay directly hotel staff warm courteous helpful throughout stay ensured everyhing able helpful advice local amenities breakfasts suitable vegetarian meat eaters morning prepared quickly tidy warm essential cold days bit noisy night settle staff tried help enjoyed stay despite circumstances london

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...”
Reviews.Author: Jodie C
Reviews.Content: wasnt expecting bb clean bed collapse day luckily sheets clean crisp quilt top bed wasnt cigarette burn holes bathroom usable cleanest broken toilet seat tune television ourselves reception awful dodgy electrics walls downstairs wafer thin luckily neighbours quiet service reception odd welcome advertised hairdryer honestly trouble worth complain reception didnt bother breakfast comment worrying bars outside window fire main building wouldnt able escape proximity park tube station 10 minute walk price local kebab corner shops nice werent spend time hotel grateful clean bed warm sleep probably wouldnt stay youre cheap dont mind roughing bit consider

Reviews.Title: “This place was bad in 1985 nothing has changed I see”
Reviews.Author: aussie85_9
Reviews.Content: bad 1985 outside look ok friends living closeby booked week people travelling mother adult sons double single bed bed linen dirty stained ceiling paper hanging curtains replacing booked mother local brother stayed nights cleaner etc clean isnt difficult dirty cheap doesnt mean dirty acceptable

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: Kook5
Reviews.Content: agree negative evaluations previous guests dire offer cheap accommodation mean dirty unfriendly extremely shabby cheapest materials breakfast awful served harried looking women whom kept shouting kitchen pleasure hearing 6 am opposite breakfast devoid eggs tomatoes told tomatoes found cheeky suspect pay arrival hand keys leaving afternoon described dump

Reviews.Title: “AVOID/DISGUSTING”
Reviews.Author: katiekins2010
Reviews.Content: absolutely awful daughter left slept park tiny barley move bed beyond filthy floor covered dirt looked poo dust smell stale smoke bad feel sick toilet shower actually nearly finished held night bathrooms cleaned badly cleaned didnt try breakfast eat dont key front door check 6 people waiting outside ten mins ringing door plus reception staff positively odd please stay written review occasion bad feel obliged

Reviews.Title: “Rather pay some more and stay somewhere else!”

Reviews.Content: positive hotel location nice calm neighbourhood tube connection park station 5 min rest horrible tiny dirty plaster dropping ceiling floor dont touch shoes worst shower toilets cleaned stay 3 days looked hadnt cleaned 3 months spend money hotel dont ruin holiday

Reviews.Title: “Bloody terrible!- Rather sleep in the streets!”

Reviews.Content: dont judge book cover photos actual hotel bb grossly misleading start look clean photos found dust window ledges mold shower scuff marks hope scuff marks walls walk bb gate hanging thread trying prevent guests crossing threshold devils bowels paint flaking building material halls arrived werent shown merely direction walk explained entering exiting building contact reception told fire exits itslef mold dirt vacuumed holes walls light fixtures covers air vent loo hanging filled dust bed dirty light bed hanging view sideback rubbish teacoffee facilities milk kettle cups dirty windows filthy lock lifted outside towel plugging gap top english breakfast poached eggs sausage spoonful beans bit toast staff hardly speak english arrived ashtray stunk means allow smoking nonsmoking law ran toilet roll tiny ensuite reception told cleaners cupboard worst sleep streets seriously wish worst enemies visit
